chinese: 我做了一些改动 对你的市场营销计划.
english: I've made some changes to your marketing plan.

chinese: 我希望你不会介意.
english: I hope you don't mind.

chinese: No, 当然不会. 很有帮助.
english: No, of course not. It was very helpful.

chinese: 我想把事情做好.
english: I want to get things right.

chinese: 说比做容易.
english: Easier said than done.

chinese: Oh,Yes.有时候 感觉我们就像在"Ho-Ho-Hotel"里
english: Oh, Yes. Sometimes  it feels like we're in"Ho-Ho-Hotel".

chinese: 你看过那个电影吗?
english: Have you ever seen that film?

chinese: Oh, 我喜爱那个电影.
english: Oh, I love that movie.

chinese: 记得那个旅馆的服务员吗?
english: Remember the bellhop?

chinese: 他一直觉得他能闻到奶酪味儿.
english: He keeps thinking he can smell cheese.

chinese: 他还对着客人们嗅来嗅去.
english: And he sniffs the guests.

chinese: 我喜欢 女服务员们把面包屑放在她们不喜欢的客人床上.
english: I like the way the chambermaids put crumbs in the beds of people they don't like.

chinese: -Oh! -客人们不能入睡...
english: -Oh! –And the guests can't sleep...

chinese: 他们就向经理抱怨...
english: And they complain to the manager...

chinese: 他们不能入睡
english: They can't sleep

chinese: 因为他们的床上有面包屑...
english: because there are crumbs in the bed...

chinese: 而他说"不要在床上吃东西."
english: And he says "Stop eating in bed."

chinese: Oh,well 至少我们还没有那种问题!
english: Oh, well at least we don't have those problems!

chinese: 突然之间我们的情形看上去好多了,
english: Suddenly our situation looks much better,

chinese: 不是吗?
english: doesn't it?
